title: Training Lower Leg Mechanics
content: In this video, Beth Lewis explains three great exercises for training lower leg mechanics. We absorb shock through the frontal plane of the foot. Being able to absorb shock efficiently is critical as we age.

title: Importance of Stability for Longevity

title: The Importance of Stability Training
content: In this episode, Beth Lewis discusses the importance of stability training for athletes and non-athletes alike. She explains that stability training helps to improve balance, prevent injuries, and enhance overall performance.

title: The Role of the Core in Stability Training
content: Lewis emphasizes the role of the core in stability training, explaining that a strong core is essential for maintaining proper form and preventing injuries during exercise. She also provides tips for effectively engaging the core during different exercises.

title: Incorporating Stability Training into Your Routine
content: Lewis provides practical advice for incorporating stability training into your exercise routine, including using unstable surfaces like balance balls and foam rollers, and performing exercises on one leg or with one arm. She also stresses the importance of starting with basic exercises and gradually progressing to more challenging ones.
